title: Render uploaded poster image on Posters page

requirements.summary: Add carry-2.png as a frontend static asset and render it responsively on the existing /posters (PosterPage) route with a non-empty English alt attribute.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/posters` renders a page (not `null`) that displays the `carry-2.png` image.
The image is served as a frontend static asset (not fetched from the backend) and loads on refresh without errors.
The image is displayed responsively (fits within viewport width, maintains aspect ratio) and has a non-empty English `alt` attribute.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded poster image as a static frontend asset so it can be referenced by the Posters page and load reliably on refresh.

Replace the null placeholder with a Posters page UI that renders the static image at /assets/carry-2.png using responsive image styling (max width/auto height, maintain aspect ratio) and a non-empty English alt attribute. Optionally use shadcn-ui (e.g., Card) for consistent page framingâ€”verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
